item.description:
Please make note of this update from one of our members:

Time: October 20, 2010 from 6pm to 8pm
Whole Foods Market
151 Sockanosset Rd
Cranston, RI

Attendance is free.
To RSVP, please contact the store @ (401) 942-7600.


Brendan Brazier, a professional athlete, vegan and author of the bestselling Thrive Diet and Thrive Fitness, will be speaking Wednesday, October 20th at the Whole Foods Market in Cranston. Brendan advocates a plant-based, whole food diet for best health and vitality.

Many of you may already be familiar with Brendan, as he's well know in the vegetarian communities. Below are the links to these event listings with directions and more details.

See the link below for additional information:

http://www.vegacommun...

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Brendan Brazier Meet and Greet
